title: Increase size of the Dashboard task list dialog window

requirements.text: Increase the size (width + height) of the Dashboard modal window shown in the screenshot (the TaskDetailDialog used for "All Categories" / "All Statuses" / "All Payment Types" and chart-click task lists) so it uses substantially more of the viewport on desktop while remaining responsive on smaller screens.
acceptanceCriteria: When opening the Dashboard summary card dialog titled "All Categories" (Dashboard > Categories card), the dialog content area is noticeably larger than before (wider and taller) on desktop screens.
The dialog remains responsive on small screens (e.g., uses viewport-relative sizing and does not overflow the viewport).
The task list content remains usable at the larger size: the table area scrolls (vertically and, if needed, horizontally) without clipping important columns (e.g., Assignee, Captain, Actions).

No changes are made to read-only Shadcn UI component sources under frontend/src/components/ui; sizing is applied via composition (e.g., DialogContent className) in app components such as frontend/src/components/TaskDetailDialog.tsx.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI component sources); apply dialog sizing via component composition and className overrides in app-owned components.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Redesigning the Dashboard charts or changing task filtering behavior.
Changing backend APIs or data models.
